column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////My biggest gripe with this place ended up being the service. All 6 of our dishes were delivered within 5 minutes. Â Therefore every inch of our table was totally filled
column2: and all of our dishes got cold before we got a chance to enjoy them. They also kept trying to take our dishes away before we were done. We felt totally rushed. I want to feel like my business is appreciated rather than having them just try to turn the table over. It actually took awhile to get our check
column3: which seemed strange considering the rest of the meal indicated that they couldn't wait for us to leave.
